question: 怖い
sourceMnemonic: This is a single kanji with an <ja>い</ja> on the end, meaning you know it's probably an adjective. What's the adjective form of <kanji>scary</kanji>? It's also <vocabulary>scary</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: You know what's really <vocabulary>scary</vocabulary>, like double scary (because kanji and vocab both mean scary)? How about your <reading>cowo</reading>rkers (<ja>こわ</ja>). They are all insane, and you know it. Absolute nutjobs they are.
